description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts that identify the role of a sample. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Specimen (SPM) and Observation Request (OBR) segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0369 (Specimen Role, version 2.5)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was first defined
Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
Whether code is considered 'backwards compatible' (whatever that means)

display.value: Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results

definition.value: Electronic QC, used with manufactured reference providing signals that simulate QC results

display.value: Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)

definition.value: Specimen used for testing proficiency of the organization performing the testing (Filler)

display.value: Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)

definition.value: Group (where a specimen consists of multiple individual elements that are not individually identified)

display.value: Replicate (of patient sample as a control)

definition.value: Replicate (of patient sample as a control)

display.value: Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)

definition.value: Pool (aliquots of individual specimens combined to form a single specimen representing all of the components.)

display.value: Specimen used for testing Operator Proficiency

display.value: Verifying Calibrator, used for periodic calibration checks
